duties_responsibilities.duty: Capture high-quality footage and apply creative storytelling techniques for video projects.
Work collaboratively with clients and fellow creatives to deliver engaging video content.
Stay updated with industry trends and techniques for cinematography and video editing.
Manage and utilize film production gear for shooting and editing purposes.
Maintain reliability by showing up on time and prepared for every shoot or editing task.
Handle projects with varying turnaround times and embrace creativity while maintaining attention to detail.
Create engaging video content from the footage provided, including fast-paced highlights and in-depth storytelling from interview footage.
